text:
November 19, 19$2
Dr* Dallas W. Smythe
Illinois University Communications
Research Institute
Urbana* Illinois
Dear Dallas*
I am in receipt of a copy of the note from Frank
acknowledging receipt of the third monitorial study in
Key fork and am reminded that there was some discussion
of your presenting to a committee^ the constitution of
which I do not remember* your revision for the proposed
budget for this study. Perhaps Frank or Jim can tell
you who constituted this committee and you can have the
provision worked out for approval by them and/or the
Executive Committee -when we meet in Urbana and Chicago
early in December. As soon as X receive the minutes of
our Minneapolis meeting* I will be a little more intelli**
gent about our various committees and can proceed with
others as needed.
My best always.
Sincerely yours.
Gray don Ausraus* Director
Radio Broadcasting Services
Manager, WUOA(FM)
GAipse
cc: Dr. Frank Schooley
